SELECT m.parent_id as parentId, p.phone as cellPhone, p.name as parentName, concat(approved, '') as auditStatus FROM parent_student_map m INNER JOIN student s ON m.student_id = s.id INNER JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id = m.parent_id and profile_type != 1 WHERE c.head_teacher_id = #{id} order by m.approved asc
